caption:
“The lion of faith fears no storm.”

Reflection:
The roaring heart of belief stands calm before thunder. Its courage is not noise but knowing.

Commentary:
This quote evokes boldness rooted in peace. Faith does not silence storms — it stands firm within them.

#VeniPublishing #VeniFaithful #FaithOverFear #ChristianMen #FaithAndCourage #ScriptureDaily #Perseverance #ScriptureOfTheDay
